comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: I think this is probably Denise Orme, aka Jessie Smither (1885-1960), English music-hall singer, she married Lord Churston in 1907, divorced him in 1928: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Denise_Orme She's dressed in a kimono here, probably because she was well-known for performing in The Mikado for a 1906 recording.

comment.author: 61622771@N00
comment._content: Beautiful composition, very nice portrait! Thanks for the quote Richard.

comment.author: 87538748@N03
comment._content: My relative ,family history says she married the Aga Kahn .Denise Orme her stage name ,also an accomplised violinist.
